title: 【詐騙強國】內地山寨「無印」招牌裝修抄到足，法庭：日本Muji敗訴！

replies.msg:
內地山寨品牌愈來愈多，甚至威脅國際品牌的業務生意。根據無印良品第二季年報，無印中國市場上半年收入下滑0.2%。截至8月底，無印在中國共運營235間門店，今年上半年新增8間，關閉2間。有分析指，無印良品的生意受到山寨店的威脅。

山寨「無印良品」是無印工坊（Natural Mill）旗下一條生產線的名稱，屬於北京棉田紡織品有限公司，其商標名稱、字型、用色和裝修都跟足日本的無印良品。

有網民發現，無印良品曾控訴山寨店侵權，竟被法庭宣判敗訴。原因是它在中国註冊商標時，沒有註冊24類商品(毛巾類），但無印工坊卻以「無印良品」之名註册了24類商品，同時，法庭認為日本無印良品無法證明它的毛巾商品在中國境內具有影響力，因此宣判其敗訴。

2017年，無印工坊乘勝追擊，反告對方侵權，最後日本無印良品須向無印工坊賠償62萬人民幣。棉田集團董事長馬濤更在專訪中表示：「希望無印良品成為國民品牌，符合大眾消費需求。」

replies.msg: 就算睇到都係沾沾自喜，覺得国家變得強大，唔使怕小日本同美帝，呢d民族主義上腦垃圾有好多！尤其是幾十年前逃避支共黎到香港，而家又要將後生仔推到支共魔爪果班廢老！
This is China
62萬入面應該有60萬用黎送俾幫佢贏官司啲官員
推

The example of the infringement of intellectual property in China

Natural Mill is the The Copycat of Japan MUJI. Natural Mill belongs to Beijing Cotton Field Textile Co., Ltd., and its trademark name, font, color and decoration are all in line with Japan's MUJI.

Japan's MUJI had accused the infringement of intellectual property for Natural Milland and was convicted by the court. The reason is that when Japan's MUJI registered a trademark in China, Japan's MUJI did not register 24 categories of goods (towels), but Natural Mill registered 24 categories of goods under the name of "MUJI". At the same time, the court held that Japan's MUJI could not prove its towel products. Also the court could not prove that Japan's MUJI has influence in China and therefore decide Japan's MUJI to lose lawsuit

In 2017, Natural Mill won the battle and countered the infringement of Japan's MUJI. Finally, Japan's MUJI had to pay RMB 620,000 to the Natural Mill.

The example of the infringement of intellectual property in China

Natural Mill is the The Copycat of Japan MUJI. Natural Mill belongs to Beijing Cotton Field Textile Co., Ltd., and its trademark name, font, color and decoration are all in line with Japan's MUJI.

Japan's MUJI had accused the infringement of intellectual property for Natural Milland and was convicted by the court. The reason is that when Japan's MUJI registered a trademark in China, Japan's MUJI did not register 24 categories of goods (towels), but Natural Mill registered 24 categories of goods under the name of "MUJI". At the same time, the court held that Japan's MUJI could not prove its towel products. Also the court could not prove that Japan's MUJI has influence in China and therefore decide Japan's MUJI to lose lawsuit

In 2017, Natural Mill won the battle and countered the infringement of Japan's MUJI. Finally, Japan's MUJI had to pay RMB 620,000 to the Natural Mill.

利害了我的國

The example of the infringement of intellectual property in China

Natural Mill is the The Copycat of Japan MUJI. Natural Mill belongs to Beijing Cotton Field Textile Co., Ltd., and its trademark name, font, color and decoration are all in line with Japan's MUJI.

Japan's MUJI had accused the infringement of intellectual property for Natural Milland and was convicted by the court. The reason is that when Japan's MUJI registered a trademark in China, Japan's MUJI did not register 24 categories of goods (towels), but Natural Mill registered 24 categories of goods under the name of "MUJI". At the same time, the court held that Japan's MUJI could not prove its towel products. Also the court could not prove that Japan's MUJI has influence in China and therefore decide Japan's MUJI to lose lawsuit

In 2017, Natural Mill won the battle and countered the infringement of Japan's MUJI. Finally, Japan's MUJI had to pay RMB 620,000 to the Natural Mill.
